Package propra22.q8493367.draw.controller

Class DrawPanelController

java.lang.Object
propra22.q8493367.draw.controller.DrawPanelController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrawPanelController
public class DrawPanelController extends Object implements IDrawPanelController
The controller of the draw panel. It also listens to all events on the draw panel.

  • Constructor Details

    • DrawPanelController

      public DrawPanelController(IPointSet pointSet, IHull convexHull, IDiameter diameter, IQuadrangle quadrangle, TangentPair tangentPair, QuadrangleSequence quadrangleSequence, DrawPanel view)
      Instantiates a new draw panel controller.
      Parameters:
      pointSet - the point set
      convexHull - the convex hull
      diameter - the diameter
      quadrangle - the quadrangle
      tangentPair - the tangent pair needed for the animation
      quadrangleSequence - the sequence of quadrangles needed for the animation
      view - the view

    • DrawPanelController

      public DrawPanelController(IPointSet pointSet, IHull hull, IDiameter diameter, IQuadrangle quadrangle, QuadrangleSequence quadrangleSequence)
      Instantiates a new draw panel controller which only takes a model. Used for calculating the data without displaying it. In this application it is used for testing.
      Parameters:
      pointSet - the draw panel model
      hull - the convex hull
      diameter - the diameter
      quadrangle - the quadrangle
      quadrangleSequence - the quadrangle sequence

  • Method Details

    • pointIsWithinMouseRadius

      private boolean pointIsWithinMouseRadius(IPoint point, int mouseX, int mouseY, IMetric metric, double radius)
      Determines if a point is within a certain radius to the mouse pointer.
      Parameters:
      point - the point
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse pointer
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse pointer
      metric - the metric, which is used to determine the distance
      radius - the radius
      Returns:
      true, the point is within the given radius of the mouse pointer, false otherwise.

    • getClosestPointToMouse

      private IPoint getClosestPointToMouse(int mouseX, int mouseY, IMetric metric)
      Gets the closest point to mouse pointer. Returns null if there is no point on the draw panel.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse pointer
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse pointer
      metric - the metric which is used to determine the distance
      Returns:
      the closest point to mouse pointer

      Specified by:

    • updateModel

      public void updateModel()
      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Updates the model of the draw panel. This means, the point set, the convex hull, the diamter, the quadrangle and the quadrangle sequence are updated. Afterwards, all observers are notified.
      Specified by:
      updateModel in interface IDrawPanelController

    • terminateAnimationThread

      Terminates the animation thread.

      public void reset()
      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Resets the draw panel controller. This method is used, if a new point set is loaded from a file or if a new draw panel is created.
      Specified by:
      reset in interface IDrawPanelController

    • clearModel

      public void clearModel()
      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Removes all points from the point set. As a consequence all points are removed from the hull.
      Specified by:
      clearModel in interface IDrawPanelController

    • insertRandomPoints

      public void insertRandomPoints(int number, int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY)
      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Insert a certain number of randomly generated points into the point set.
      Specified by:
      insertRandomPoints in interface IDrawPanelController
      Parameters:
      number - the number of random points to be inserted into the point set.
      minX - the minimum x coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      minY - the minimum y coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      maxX - the maximum x coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      maxY - the maximum y coordinate which the points are allowed to have

      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Inserts a point into the point set as result of an action by the user. Afterwards, the model is updated.
      Specified by:
      insertPointToPointSetByUserInput in interface IDrawPanelController
      Parameters:

      y - the y coordinate of the point.

      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse.
      totalScale - the total scale

    • initializePointDrag

      public void initializePointDrag(int mouseX, int mouseY, double totalScale)
      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Initializes a point drag.
      Specified by:
      initializePointDrag in interface IDrawPanelController
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse which is the starting x coordinate of the drag
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse which is the starting y coordinate of the drag
      totalScale - scale * panelScale. This value is needed to calculate the distance in the model.

    • hullAsArray

      public int[][] hullAsArray()
      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Returns the hull as an array.
      Specified by:
      hullAsArray in interface IDrawPanelController
      Returns:
      the n x 2 int array which contains the coordinate of all points of the hull moving clockwise along the hull. We refer to a standard cartesian coordinate system.

      public void setMousePositionIsOverPanel(boolean b)
      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Sets the state of the mouse. b is true if the mouse pointer is located over the draw panel. b is false, if the mouse pointer is not located over the draw panel.
      Specified by:
      setMousePositionIsOverPanel in interface IDrawPanelController
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the mouse is located over the draw panel. False otherwise.

    • setSelectedPoint

      private void setSelectedPoint(double totalScale)
      Sets the selected point.
      Parameters:
      totalScale - scale * panelScale. This value is needed to calculate distances in the model. We need it to determine the selected point.

    • updateMouseData

      public void updateMouseData(int mouseX, int mouseY, double totalScale)
      Description copied from interface: IDrawPanelController
      Updates the mouse data.
      Specified by:
      updateMouseData in interface IDrawPanelController
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse.
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse.
      totalScale - the product of scale and panelScale. This value is needed to calculate distances in the model. In this application we need it to determine the selected point.
